title: Breaking Down the First Two Episodes of ‘Better Call Saul’ Season 6, With Joanna Robinson
description:
Chris is joined by Joanna Robinson to talk about the first two episodes of ‘Better Call Saul’ Season 6. They talk about getting up to speed after the show’s two-year hiatus (1:00), where we find Kim and Jimmy’s relationship (25:15), and try to make some predictions for where the season might go (34:55).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Joanna Robinson
Producer: Kaya McMullen
